article_title: Cancer deaths down overall, but still high in disadvantaged communities
article_text:
American Cancer Society's Cancer Statistics 2014

Five-year relative survival rates for selected cancers by race and state at diagnosis in the U.S. from 2003 to 2009.

Cancer deaths down overall, but still high in disadvantaged communities
